ygData.subject: Re: [neat] New Paper on Minimal Criterion Coevolution: A New Approach to Open-Ended Search
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Colin, I believe what you re talking about with N% elitism is  sort of like what s called truncation selection, which I believe is the default in my
